website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a basic, inexpensive body powder by a trusted, popular brand, Gold Bond is the one to buy.
pros: Talc-free powder that absorbs moisture and soothes skin
Scent isn't overpowering and can be described as clean and pleasant
cons: Some containers were only half-full upon delivery
Rare reports of rash after use

customer_reviews.title: Great powder
customer_reviews.text: I can beat around the bush or I can get straight to the point. I use this on my balls to keep them from sticking to my legs, and it works great. It isn't medicated, and it reduces the friction and the heat (probably caused by the friction) all day long. It isn't talc so it doesn't have that baby powder smell to it either. I highly recommend if you're looking for a way to reduce chafing.

product_meta.description:
Size:10 Ounce (Pack of 3)Gold Bond Ultimate Comfort Body Powder with Aloe and Chamomile provides soothing relief, comfort, and odor protection. Apply after you shower to stay feeling fresh, dry, silky-soft, and comfortable throughout your day. Gold Bond Ultimate Comfort Body Powder is a gentle, talc-free powder that helps keep you feeling fresh and dry, while absorbing moisture and providing odor protection. Aloe, chamomile, and other botanicals help your skin feel silky soft. A good skincare routine should be simple, and include a good moisturizing lotion. Gold Bond Ultimate Men's Essentials are skin lotions for men specially formulated for rough, dry skin that can be used on your body, hands and face. While Gold Bond powder may be the best known product, Gold Bond carries medicated and non-medicated body powders, skin creams, lotions, and ointments. From first aid to foot care and face lotion, Gold Bond has you covered. Since 1908, Gold Bond powder has been providing comfort, soothing relief, and skincare to adults and children, from baby's first bath and powder, to eczema or psoriasis relief, to lotion for dry skin or men's 5-in-1 Face Lotion.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Gold Bond Ultimate Comfort Body Powder offers ultimate freshness, moisture control, and odor protection throughout the day. Talc-free powder protects against chaffing.
